head.title: function-url-quotes
head.description: function-url-quotes Specify single, double or no quotes for urls. Options string: "single"|"double"|"none" "single" Url quotes must…

body:
#function-url-quotes

Specify single, double or no quotes for urls.

a { background: url("x.jpg") }
/**                 ↑     ↑
 *             These quotes */

#Options

string: "single"|"double"|"none"

#"single"

Url quotes must always be single.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { background: url("x.jpg"); }
@import url(foo.css);
@document domain("http://www.w3.org/");
@font-face { font-family: 'foo'; src: url("foo.ttf"); }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { background: url('x.jpg'); }
@import url('foo.css');
@document domain('http://www.w3.org/');
@font-face { font-family: "foo"; src: url('foo.ttf'); }

#"double"

Url quotes must always be double.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { background: url('x.jpg'); }
@import url(foo.css);
@font-face { font-family: "foo"; src: url('foo.ttf'); }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { background: url("x.jpg"); }
@import url("foo.css");
@font-face { font-family: 'foo'; src: url("foo.ttf"); }

#"none"

Urls must not be quoted.

The following patterns are considered warnings:

a { background: url('x.jpg'); }
@import url("foo.css");
@font-face { font-family: "foo"; src: url('foo.ttf'); }

The following patterns are not considered warnings:

a { background: url(x.jpg); }
@import url(foo.css);
@font-face { font-family: 'foo'; src: url(foo.ttf); }
